Posts.Content: Feb 9, 2012 07:58PM helend56 wrote: Hi everyone this my 1st post but been reading on here for several weeks. I am on AC x 4 and then Taxol x 12. My first ac was really bad with lots of nausea, fatigue and sore mouth also night sweats, but so far after 2nd tx still feeling pretty good! Thank you Lord!! My onc gave me Atavan to go along with Zofran and Phenergan if necessary .IÂ sure believe the Atavan has helped alot. Just thought I would share my journey with people who truly understand. I am triple neg Stage 1 clear margins and nodes!
